full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 29 of 261 1169 LC6Cmax1 Kate - direct 1 DIRECT EXAMINATION BY MS. POMERANTZ: 2 Q. Good morning. If you could pull up to the microphone so we 3 can hear you. 4 A. That's fine? 5 Q. Yes. Thank you. To be clear, are you testifying under the 6 name Kate today? 7 A. Yes. 8 Q. Is Kate your real name? 9 A. No. 10 Q. Leading up to this trial, did you ask to testify under a 11 pseudonym to protect your privacy? 12 A. I did. 13 Q. Kate, can you take a look, there should be a binder next to 14 you. 15 MS. POMERANTZ: Your Honor, at this time, I would 16 request that the jurors be permitted to take out their binders 17 and turn to Government Exhibit 16, which is in evidence under seal. 18 THE COURT: It is in evidence already. Let me just 19 confirm. 20 MS. POMERANTZ: Thank you, your Honor. 21 THE COURT: Without objection, Ms. Sternheim? 22 MS. STERNHEIM: Without objection. 23 THE COURT: Members of the jury, you may pick up your 24 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012780
